resources.string:
DISCLAIMER 
 
 
This application was built solely for research purposes. Do NOT misuse this application for malicious activities. 
 
This application is licensed under the TBD license.
It uses the following libraries:
 - Cydia Substrate (Licensed under the LGPLv3)
 - LibNFC (Licensed under the Apache License, v2.0)
 - Protobuf (Licensed under the BSD 3-Clause license) 
 
We take no responsibility for, and will not be liable for, the application behaving silly due to technical issues beyond our control. 
 
 
 
 NFCgate v1.0
You are using a Broadcom BCM20793 chip, which has some known problems. We are using a workaround to avoid some of these, but this has some side effects. Do you want to read more?
